message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you my unique product. Given its value, I believe it's worth $120 to you. I'm proposing to sell it to you for $110. I hope this price aligns with your expectations and allows me to earn a fair return for my effort and resources invested in this product.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the quality of your product, $110 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm happy to pay $105 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. After considering our previous discussion, I am willing to adjust the price to $107. This still allows me to recover a reasonable return while remaining competitive. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
